data.name: fastpli
data.description: Fiber Architecture Simulation Toolbox for 3D Polarized Light Imaging

evidence: "Fiber Architecture Simulation Toolbox for 3D-PLI (fastpli) is a toolbox for polarized light imaging (PLI) with three main purposes" followed by modules and tutorials showing it is run by end users for modeling and simulation.

"fastPLI is an open source toolbox for modeling nerve fibers, simulating them in a 3D-PLI microscope and the signal processing developed by the fiber architecture group at the Forschungszentrum JÃ¼lich" (indicates a specific research group as maintainer).

Installation instructions emphasize cloning and building from GitHub: "git clone --recursive https://github.com/3d-pli/fastpli.git" and then "make fastpli\npip3 install .", indicating distribution primarily via the source repository.
